label: Azadbakhsh, Saeed.  2017. A new species and new synonym of subgenus Chlaeniellus Reitter, 1908 (Coleoptera: Carabidae) with re-establishment of Chlaenius (Chlaeniellus) rapyllii Morvan, 1975 as a valid species. Zootaxa 4226(1): 144–150.
